header: {"User-Agent":"Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 6.0; Nexus 5 Build/MRA58N) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/105.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36 Edg/105.0.1343.33"}

ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##本章没完，请点击下—页继续阅读！如果被转码了请退出转码或者更换浏揽器即可。##
##本章未完，请点击下一页继续阅读！##
##本章未完，点击下一页继续阅读。

ruleBookInfo.author: @css:div#content > table > tbody > tr:eq(0) > td > table > tbody > tr:eq(1) > td:eq(1) @text ##.*：##
ruleBookInfo.coverUrl: @css:div#content > table > tbody > tr:eq(3) > td > table > tbody > tr > td:eq(1) > a @href
ruleBookInfo.intro: @css:div#content > table > tbody > tr:eq(3) > td > table > tbody > tr > td:eq(1) > div @textNodes
ruleBookInfo.kind: {{@css:div#content > table > tbody > tr:eq(0) > td > table > tbody > tr:eq(2) > td:eq(1) @text ##.*：##}},{{@css:div#content > table > tbody > tr:eq(0) > td > table > tbody > tr:eq(1) > td:eq(0) @text ##.*：##}}
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter: {{@css:div#content > table > tbody > tr:eq(3) > td > table > tbody > tr > td:eq(1) > div > a @text}}({{@css:div#content > table > tbody > tr:eq(0) > td > table > tbody > tr:eq(2) > td:eq(0) @text ##.*：##}})
ruleBookInfo.name: @css:div#content > table > tbody > tr:eq(0) > td > table > tbody > tr:eq(0) @text
ruleBookInfo.tocUrl: @css:div#content > table > tbody > tr:eq(6) > td > table > caption > a @href
ruleBookInfo.wordCount: @css:div#content > table > tbody > tr:eq(0) > td > table > tbody > tr:eq(1) > td:eq(3) @text ##.*：##

ruleContent.nextContentUrl: {{@css:div.nr_page:contains(未完下一页) > a.dise:contains(未完下一页) @href}},{"webView":true}

ruleToc.chapterList: section[class="zxjz fk"]:contains(全部章节) > ul > li > a
